tModLoader.ModOldWarning: Устаревший мод, включайте на свой страх и риск
tModLoader.ModDependencyClickTooltip:
Этот мод зависит от: {0}
 (нажмите чтобы включить)
tModLoader.BetaModCantPublish: Этот мод был собран на бета версии и не может быть опубликован
tModLoader.BetaModCantPublishError: You cannot publish a Mod built on a Beta version of tModLoader
tModLoader.ModsOriginatedFromModBrowser: Этот мод установлен из Браузера модов
tModLoader.LoadErrorRecipes: Произошла ошибка при добавлении рецептов для {0}
tModLoader.LoadErrorDisabledSeeBelowForError: Этот мод был автоматически отключен. Смотрите ниже для самой ошибки:
tModLoader.LoadErrorVersionMessage:
Было обнаружено, что этот мод был собран для tModLoader версии v{0}
Однако, Вы используете версию v{1}
tModLoader.LoadErrorHashMismatchCorrupted: Hash mismatch, data blob has been modified or corrupted
tModLoader.LoadErrorDependencyVersionTooLow: {0} requires version {1} of {2} but version {3} is installed
tModLoader.LoadWarningBannerOrBannerItemNotSet: {0}: {1}. You have set ModNPC.banner or ModNPC.bannerItem, but not the other. Make sure you set both, check your spelling, and that the item exists if you are using mod.ItemType(). Report this to the {0} developers.
tModLoader.BuildErrorModNameEmpty: Mods must actually have stuff in their names
tModLoader.BuildErrorModNamedTerraria: Mods names cannot be named Terraria
tModLoader.BuildErrorModNameHasPeriod: A mod's internal name cannot contain a period
tModLoader.BuildErrorTwoModsSameName: Two mods share the internal name {0}
tModLoader.BuildErrorCompilingError: An error ocurred while compiling a mod.
tModLoader.BuildErrorModCompileFolderHint: It is likely that you didn't install correctly. Make sure you installed the ModCompile folder as well.
tModLoader.BuildErrorModNameDoesntMatchAssemblyName: Mod name {0} does not match assembly name {1}
tModLoader.BuildErrorNamespaceFolderDontMatch: Namespace and Folder name do not match. The top level namespace must match the folder name.
tModLoader.BuildErrorNoModClass: Make sure you have exactly one class extending Mod.
tModLoader.BuildErrorDotNet45forCS6: .NET Framework 4.5 must be installed to compile C# 6.0
tModLoader.BuildErrorPDBWindowsOnly: PDB files can only be generated for windows, on windows.
tModLoader.LoadErrorTextureFailedToLoad: The texture file at {0} failed to load
tModLoader.LoadErrorWavSoundFailedToLoad: The wav sound file at {0} failed to load
tModLoader.LoadErrorMP3SoundFailedToLoad: The mp3 sound file at {0} failed to load
tModLoader.LoadErrorFontFailedToLoad: The font file at {0} failed to load
tModLoader.LoadErrorEffectFailedToLoad: The effect file at {0} failed to load
tModLoader.LoadErrorUnknownXNBFileHint: Unknown xnb file {path}. Perhaps it should be in Fonts/ or Effects/
tModLoader.LoadErrorAddItemOnlyInLoad: AddItem can only be called from Mod.Load or Mod.Autoload
tModLoader.LoadError2ModItemSameName: You tried to add 2 ModItems with the same name: {0}. Maybe 2 classes share a classname but in different namespaces while autoloading or you manually called AddItem with 2 items of the same name.
tModLoader.ModInfoVisitHomepage: Посетите домашнюю страницу мода для более подробной информации
tModLoader.ModInfoProblemTryAgain: There was a problem, try again
tModLoader.ModPacksSaveEnabledAsNewPack: Сохранить включенные моды в новую сборку
tModLoader.MPServerModsCantDownload: The following mods are installed on the server but cannot be downloaded
tModLoader.MPServerModsCantDownloadReasonSigned: because you only accept mods signed by the mod browser
tModLoader.MPServerModsCantDownloadReasonAutomaticD: because you have disabled automatic mod downloading
tModLoader.MPServerModsCantDownloadChangeSettingsHi: You will need to change your settings or acquire the mods from the server owner.
tModLoader.MPErrorModNotSigned: Mod was not signed by the Mod Browser
tModLoader.MBShowMSBoth: Показывать только моды для обеих сторон
tModLoader.MBShowMSNoSync: Показывать только моды не требующие синхронизации
tModLoader.MBModsNotFoundOnline: The following mods were not found on the Mod Browser: {0}
tModLoader.MBExceededBandwidth: The Mod Browser server has exceeded its daily bandwidth allotment. Please consult this mod's homepage for an alternate download or try again later.
tModLoader.MBUnknownMBError: Unknown Mod Browser Error. Try again later.
tModLoader.MBPublishVisitWebsiteForPassphrase: Посетите сайт чтобы сгенерировать код доступа
tModLoader.DownloadSignedYes: Скачивать только проверенные моды с серверов: Да
tModLoader.DownloadSignedNo: Скачивать только проверенные моды с серверов: Нет
tModLoader.ReloadModsReminder: Вы обновили мод. Не забудьте перезагрузить моды, чтобы изменения вступили в силу.
tModLoader.EnableModsReminder: Ваши недавно скачанные моды в данный момент выключены. Не забудьте включить их и выполнить перезагрузку, если вы планируете использовать их.
tModLoader.MigratePlayersMessage:
You have no players.
If you'd like to migrate your players from vanilla to tModLoader,
please copy them from /Terraria/Players to /Terraria/ModLoader/Players.
Copy the .plr file and the similarly named folder over.
Click me to open those folders.
After copying over the players you want, press back.
tModLoader.MigrateWorldsMessage:
You have no worlds.
If you'd like to migrate your worlds from vanilla to tModLoader,
please copy them from /Terraria/Worlds to /Terraria/ModLoader/Worlds.
Copy the .wld file over.
Click me to open those folders.
After copying over the worlds you want, press back.
tModLoader.ModsDifferentSinceLastPlay: The following mods are different since last time you played:
tModLoader.ExtractHideCodeMessage: The modder has chosen to hide the code from tModReader.
tModLoader.ExtractNoSourceCodeMessage: The modder has not chosen to include their source code.
tModLoader.ExtractHideResourcesMessage: The modder has chosen to hide resources (ie. images) from tModReader.
tModLoader.CommandModListDescription: Displays a list of loaded mods.
tModLoader.StartBagTooltip: Some starting items couldn't fit in your inventory
tModLoader.DefaultTownNPCChat: My modder forgot to give me a chat message.
